name: gallery-itsawidgetrenderpromise
description: This module adds some renderPromises to the Y.Widget class.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: using-renderpromise
examples.displayName: Waiting for multiple widgets to be rendered
examples.description: This example shows how to use renderPromise() with Y.batch() in order to take action once all widgets are rendered.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: using-readypromise
examples.displayName: Create widget-extention and make use of readyPromise()
examples.description: This example shows how to use readyPromise() to take action once a widget is complete ready.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: using-renderonavailablepromise
examples.displayName: Render a widget before scrNode is in the DOM
examples.description: This example shows how to use renderOnAvailable() to render an Y.Calendar-instance before the scrNode is in the DOM.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: using-renderwhenavailable
examples.displayName: Making a widget re-render multiple times
examples.description: This example shows how to re-render a widget by the appearance and removal of the containerNode.
author: itsasbreuk
